parameters.multi: is a multimedia kit (speakers, sound card) included ?
parameters.premium: is the manufacturer was a "premium" firm (IBM, COMPAQ) ?
parameters.ads: number of 486 price listings for each month
parameters.trend: time trend indicating month starting from January of 1993 to November of 1995.
parameters.price: price in US dollars of 486 PCs
parameters.ram: size of Ram in in MB
parameters.hd: size of hard drive in MB

description:
Description
a cross-section from 1993 to 1995
number of observations :  6259
observation :  goods
country :  United States
title: Prices of Personal Computers
reference: Stengos, T.  and  E.  Zacharias (2005) “Intertemporal pricing and price discrimination : a semiparametric hedonic analysis of the personal computer market”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, forthcoming.
